snippet: The N.C.A.A. tournament will return to Madison Square Garden in 2014, when the arena will host the East Regional for the first time in 53 years.
abstract: College basketball's NCAA East Regional tournament will return to Madison Square Garden in 2014 for first time in 53 years.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. tournament will return to Madison Square Garden in 2014, when the arena will host the East Regional for the first time in 53 years.

headline.seo: Madison Square Garden to Host N.C.A.A. Hoops Regional
headline.main: Madison Square Garden to Host N.C.A.A. Hoops Regional
